exceptions.tactic: intros K V b a H1 H2.
intros K' V b a H1 H2.
intros K' V' b a H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a' H1 H2.

original: intros K V b a H1 H2. destruct H1 as [l1 H1]. destruct H2 as [l2 H2]. exists (plus l1 (opp l2)). apply is_series_plus. - apply H1. - apply is_series_opp in H2. apply (is_series_decr_1 b). apply H2.
